title: Bug 120315: Display property not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it is not being applied in the new PDF emitter.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', the label should disappear.
EB: In the PDF preview, the label is still visible, even though its display property is set to 'none'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application. 
2. Navigate to the page with the label. 
3. Set the display property of the label to 'none'. 
4. Preview the page in PDF format. 
5. Verify that the label is still visible, although it should be hidden due to the 'none' display property.
